definition: various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: So it is both a kind of artistical work and a practical everyday life decoration accessories.
sentences.chinese: 它既是藝術品，又是生活中的實用裝飾品。

sentences.english: Provide dedicated glass art, collectibles and silverware tall.
sentences.chinese: 竭誠提供琉璃藝術品，收藏品及銀飾掛飾。

sentences.english: Coherence refers to the belonging together or the various parts of the artwork.
sentences.chinese: 連貫性是指一件藝術品各個部分屬性協調一致。

sentences.english: There are so many works of art that some of them must be stored away.
sentences.chinese: 羅浮宮的館藏衆多，以致於有些藝術品必須收存起來。

sentences.english: Even from the outer walls there was much artwork to admire.
sentences.chinese: 甚至從外牆開始就有很多藝術品值得讚美。

sentences.english: The texts on these objects tend to be either proverbs or general blessings.
sentences.chinese: 這些藝術品上的文字多爲諺語或一般的祝詞。

sentences.english: The atelier itself can be described as an work of art.
sentences.chinese: 這個工作室本身可以被描述爲一個藝術品。

sentences.english: Wood panelling and original artwork create an aura of old world charm.
sentences.chinese: 木鑲板和原始藝術品創造一箇舊世界的魅力光環。

sentences.english: and then art on the weekends.
This exlusive Limited Edition of 35 will be offered for sale.
sentences.chinese: 此件限量版藝術品限量35版發售。

sentences.english: Serge said his artwork was “all about the intersection of text and space.”
sentences.chinese: Serge說他的藝術品是“相交的文字和空間”。

sentences.english: Wood is wood as raw material, carving a variety of images of art.
sentences.chinese: 木雕是以木材爲原料，雕刻各種形象的藝術品。

sentences.english: She is a legendary huntress whose traps are works of art.
sentences.chinese: 她是充滿傳奇色彩的獵者，其陷阱是個藝術品。

sentences.english: Athena was the goddess of wisdom and patroness of house holdarts.
sentences.chinese: 雅典娜是智慧女神和家居藝術品的守護女神。

sentences.english: Printmaking is the process of making artworks by printing, normally on paper.
sentences.chinese: 版畫是製作過程藝術品印刷，通常是紙上談兵。

sentences.english: He's looking for things to sell in his shop.
sentences.chinese: 他正在爲自己的商店找一些藝術品出售。

definition: to auction/auction sale/to sell at a reduced price
Asia/abbr. for 亞細亞洲|亚细亚洲[Ya4 xi4 ya4 Zhou1]
to disseminate/to give publicity to/propaganda/CL:個|个[ge4]
specific topic (addressed by a book, lecture, TV program etc)/article, report or program etc on a specific topic
